name: Neurology
description: Neurology is a branch of medicine dealing with disorders of the nervous system. Neurology deals with the diagnosis and treatment of all.

name: Opthalmology
description: Ophthalmology is the study of medical conditions relating to the eye. Ophthalmologists are doctors who specialize in the medical and surgical treatment of this organ.

name: Neuclear Magnetic
description: Nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) is a physical phenomenon in which nuclei in a strong constant magnetic field are perturbed by a weak oscillating magnetic field (in the near field).

name: Surgical
description: Surgery is a medical or dental specialty that uses operative manual and instrumental techniques on a person to investigate or treat a pathological condition such as a disease or injury.

name: Cardiology
description: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the circulatory system.

name: X-ray
description: An X-ray, or, much less commonly, X-radiation, is a penetrating form of high-energy electromagnetic radiation.

name: Dental
description: Dentistry, also known as dental medicine and oral medicine, is a branch of medicine that consists of the study, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases, disorders, and conditions of the oral.

name: Traumatology
description: In medicine, traumatology is the study of wounds and injuries caused by accidents or violence to a person, and the surgical therapy and repair of the damage. Traumatology is a branch of medicine.

name: ECG
description: Electrocardiography is the process of producing an electrocardiogram. It is a graph of voltage versus time of the electrical activity of the heart using electrodes placed on the skin
